segments.text: What ’ s wrong ? That was a great goal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but I bet $ 200 dollars on the Cougars !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Looks like you ’ re going to lose out on this game then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t believe it ! I thought the Cougars were going to win for sure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 20 to 1 , in favour of the Cougars !
segments.speaker: S1
